name: Lactose INTOLERANCE!
description:
We didn't quite finish in time, but here is our submission for the raylib 5k gamejam! For a more up-to-date version, checkout the game's GitHub repository.

Lactose INTOLERANCE!

Have you ever been at the office and needed to let out some gas but the boss keeps giving you work to do!?

Have you ever really needed to go #2 in an unfortunate situation, and when you finally make it to the bathroom, you think “that was close!” ??!?!

In Lactose INTOLERANCE!, you are:

  • ‘Close’ to farting on your co-workers
  • ‘Close’ to pooping your pants
  • ‘Close’ to getting fired!

Lactose INTOLERANCE! is a sort of ‘chaos management’ game where you work in a typical 9 to 5 office job, have to complete tasks, and get through the work day all while being gassy. The player must avoid farting on co-workers to keep his reputation and his job. Farts are triggered on a timer and spread around using fart-automaton.

Controls  
  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Space to Interact
